function.description: Returns an integer higher or equal to startPos of the index of string2 in string1. startPos defaults to 0. Returns -1 if the index could not be found.

examples.example: String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test"); // Outputs: 3 String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test", 3); // Outputs: 3 String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "Test", 5); // Outputs: 7 String.indexOf("maxTestTest", "test"); // Outputs: -1
